sub_title: Senior Director - Global Head of Factory Performance, Danfoss Business System at Danfoss
summary:
I am passionate about achieving breakthrough performance in business. Seeing opportunities to improve and transform or even create something new. I accept challenges when others back off by telling “this can not be done “or “it is going to be very difficult “. 
In complex situations I will bring structure, a shared vision, a plan and sustainable results. 
Believing maximized business results requires a clear plan where each and every improvement initiative and every employee needs to contribute in the journey towards “the dot on the horizon“ (the shared vision). 

From my experiences I know that sustainable transformation is about leading and building capabilities where leadership, E2E processes, performance management and above all the employees with their behaviors and talent will perform in an optimal way. All these elements are needed and to be aligned to make the successful journey to reach the vision. 

I get energy from the enormous potential in ideas and dedication when enabling employees to personally contribute towards the shared vision.

My areas of expertise are Plant management, Operations management, Maintenance and Asset management, Continuous Improvement, Operational Excellence, Engineering, Manufacturing, Supply chain management, Order to Cash. I have multi-sector experience such as in Building products, Architectural products, healthcare products and systems, consumer electronics, energy, chemical, oil and gas, process industry and manufacturing in general, with demonstrated strengths in:
-	Leading complex business transformations
-	Program- and Project Management
-	Change management
-	Change Leadership
-	Performance management
-	Consultancy
-	Coaching

Other specific expertise:
Six Sigma, Lean Six Sigma, Master Black belt, Interim manager, Business Transformation, Industry 4.0, IoT, Smart Industry, Digital, Digital Transformation, Data analysis, Mentor, VOC, CTQ, SIPOC, Lean, Self-directed Teams, Lean Deployment, interim, Design-for-Six-Sigma (DFSS), Operational Excellence, Strategy Deployment, Process Improvement,TPM, Kaizen, Lean Office, Value Stream Mapping, OEE, Maintenance Management, Program Management, DFX, Lean Champion

education.field_of_study: Post Master Psychology of Organizational Change

profile_positions.title: Global Head of Factory Performance DCS
Senior Director DBS Regional Head EMEA

profile_positions.description:
DBS is an exceptionally strong internal element that runs in  The Danfoss DNA.
DBS consists of Highly qualified specialists and project leaders who can challenge, develop and support the business.
DBS takes ownership of end-to-end business processes through a cross-organizational network in Danfoss and ensures that every corner of Danfoss is focused on achieving excellence.
It is all about ensuring that “The way we do things at Danfoss” is followed by all.
DBS is a diverse and multicultural team located all over the world, allowing us to have a local presence to rapidly respond to challenges and opportunities as they arise. Furthermore the global presence gives us the ability to compose teams of key persons to allow for swift integration of acquired companies, turnarounds and accelerate the achievement of synergies to the benefit of the Danfoss Group.
Operational excellence is in the Danfoss’ DNA, the Danfoss productivity improvement has increased by double digits year over year since 2010 – this is an impressive improvement of 180% during a decade.
In DBS, we never stand still, and we will continue to invest in solutions that can strengthen productivity.
A present strategic focus in DBS is to build a flexible World-Class Supply Chain so agile and flexible that it delivers every time - independently of the current market situation and with high focus on Safety, Quality, Delivery and Cost.
To reach this focus, we are quickly moving towards digital transformation to gain speed and agility in serving our customers. Clean data is critical to a successful operation in our digital ecosystem. To adapt to the market – we need to foresee customer requirements before they exist.
The efforts of DBS will support that the Danfoss Group is able to achieve and maintain industry leading position. DBS is continually pushing Danfoss to be world class, evolving the Danfoss value proposition as society, competition and customer demands.

We engineer tomorrow and build a better future.

profile_positions.description: Philips Industry Consulting as part of Philips Innovation Services helps you create business excellence by developing and or optimizing your operational and innovation processes. Customer orientation, quality, speed and costs are our focus. Call on our team of seasoned industry professionals with in-depth experience and a hands-on approach, to assist you in delivering tangible and lasting business results. Implementation-oriented, we work closely with your employees, creating a learning-on-the-job environment which enables your organization to develop its own “continuous improvement” culture.
profile_positions.title: Senior Consultant - Lean Six Sigma Master Black Belt, Change management , Operational Excellence

profile_positions.description:
•Responsible for optimizing the performance of CHP plant Inesco.
•Improve Inesco’s plant reliability and deliver according to plan.
•Designing and optimizing of all main processes and performance  management.
•Deliver according  to budget, deliver the kpi’s according to targets on e.g. HSE, operation and maintenance. 
•Establishing a new organisation and site team with local contract partners. 
•Establish a cultural change toward teamwork and a common goal with our local partners.
profile_positions.title: Plant Manager WKC Power Plant Inesco Antwerpen

profile_positions.description:
•Drive the sustainable implementation of HPO and Lean Six Sigma philosophy and methodology Essent wide and to advise and support the Board of Directors and Executive Team on HPO , Change Leadership program and Lean Six Sigma approach. 
•Design and facilitation of company wide Change Leadership program (CLP)
•Identify, measure and realize the Essent wide improvement potential for HPO, change leadership, performance management and Lean Six Sigma.  
•Manage, lead and coach the team of HPO resources 
•Coach, challenge and support  BU Directors and Leadership in start up and implementation of HPO, change leadership and Lean Six Sigma change projects.in order to achieve their business goals and kpi's
•Organise and facilitate international RWE Change leadership Group meetings.

Certified Lean Six Sigma Master Black Belt, Lean Six Sigma trainer , deployment leader, program manger, Principal consultant

•Chairman of Dutch Lean Six Sigma user group with more than 40 major Dutch companies from utility, banking & insurance, telecommunication, industry etc.

profile_positions.title: Principal Consultant/ Master Black Belt

profile_positions.location: Muelheim ad Ruhr, Duisburg and Hengelo
profile_positions.description:
Siemens Power Generation Business unit Business Excellence Location Erlangen. 
 
•As MBB and Program Manager: Actively developing and supporting the division management in achieving their Lean Six Sigma goals and consequently their business successes.
•Facilitate structured project selection events which include senior management. 
•Training (English and German) in Lean Six Sigma of International Management, Green belts and Black belts 
•Supported and coached 104 Green and Black belts in Duisburg, Muelheim, Erfurt, Budapest, New Delhi and Cilegon (Indonesia) for the Power Generation Steam turbine and Generator division. 
•Successful coaching of Lean Six Sigma  Projects (BB/GB), measured by 55 completed projects and 32 certified BB/GB in assigned organizations.
•Trainer in Green Belt and Black Belt trainings ( in English, German and Dutch) worldwide.
•Demonstrated leadership, self confidence in working with senior management, demonstrated knowledge of Lean Six Sigma, develop strategic thinking skills.
•Demonstrated Coaching and mentoring skills, motivational skills, conflict resolution, building interpersonal relationships, management skills and techniques.
•Demonstrated knowledge of Lean Six Sigma tools and methods, but also able to communicate well, proficient at public speaking, proficient at educating.
•Additional assignment:
Support division Steam Turbines strategic initiative Steam for Future (SFF) in Muelheim  as project leader. With this strategic initiative cultural issues were addressed among the department silo’s. Keywords are: communication, thrust and cooperation. Executive management personal coaching with daily feedback sessions on results were part of my assignment.
profile_positions.title: Lean Six Sigma Master Black Belt
